markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Familiar Conduit](/Feats.aspx?ID=6330) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 200 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=250)

**Prerequisites**
[Familiar Master Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6328); able to cast spells

**Requirements**
You have line of effect to your familiar.

</column>

---

Under your tutelage, your familiar has grown attuned to the hidden currents of the world and can serve as a conduit for your magic. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has a range, the spell uses the familiar as its origin point.
name: Familiar Conduit
prerequisite: Familiar Master Dedication; able to cast spells
prerequisite_markdown: [Familiar Master Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6328); able to cast spells
requirement: You have line of effect to your familiar.
requirement_markdown: You have line of effect to your familiar.
